mutants.code:
def is_substring(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.strip()
    s2 = s2.strip()
    if s1 == '' and s2 == '':
        return False
    s1 = ''.join((e for e in s1 if e.isalnum()))
    s2 = ''.join((e for e in s2 if e.isalnum()))
    return s2 in s1

def is_substring(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.strip()
    s2 = s2.strip()
    if s1 == '' or s2 == '':
        return False
    s1 = ''.join((e for e in s1 if e.isalnum()))
    s2 = ''.join((e for e in s2 if e.isalnum()))
    return s2 not in s1
